dashboard.quote-request-status-accepted-desc: Indicates that the quote request is accepted by seller and will provide a quote
dashboard.quote-request-status-cancelled-desc: Indicates that the buyer has cancelled the quote
dashboard.quote-request-status-rejected-desc: Indicates that the seller has rejected the quote
dashboard.quote-request-status-submitted-desc: Indicates that the quote has been submitted and awaits response from seller
dashboard.quote-requests-view-only-desc: To manage quote requests, please request your company administrator to grant you the necessary permissions
dashboard.quote-status-accepted-desc: Indicates that the quote is accepted by seller and buyer
dashboard.quote-status-declined-desc: Indicates that the buyer has declined the quote
dashboard.quote-status-inprogress-desc: Indicates that the quote is accepted to be negotiated- Buyer needs to accept, decline or renegotiate
dashboard.quote-status-renegotiated-desc: Indicating that the Seller has created a new Quote after a renegotiation has been requested
dashboard.quote-status-waiting-desc: Indicates that the quote has been declined to be renegotiated by the buyer and awaits reply from seller
dashboard.quote-status-withdrawn-desc: Indicates that the seller has withdrawn the Quote before the buyer has accepted it
